long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This accessibility plugin allows you to temporarily rotate seating plans and assists with spatial awareness.

This plugin allows you to rotate your seating plans on Arbor by 180 degrees so that you can either print the page and use it for the teachers view or rotate and display on the projector from the students view.

This plugin is needed because the view of a seating plan is different to the perspective of a teacher and resolves the problem by temporary rotating them. Some students and teachers struggle to read the plan the correct way round. If you close the tab or refresh the page, it will revert to the original seating plan.
